title: Aaib Investigation To Atr 72 212 A G Iac

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
AAIB investigation to ATR 72-212 A, G-IACZ. Aircraft diverted because the flaps could not be fully extended on approach to Cornwall Airport, Newquay, 15 April 2025

Independent report: AAIB Record-only UAS investigations reviewed: August - September 2025. This is a list of AAIB Record-only UAS investigations that were reviewed during August - September 2025.

AAIB Report: Cessna T210M, N761JU. Fatal accident involving a Cessna T210M, N761JU, Leeds East Airport, 11 April 2024

sections.heading: Context
sections.content: These developments affect aviation connectivity, airspace management, and surface access to airports. Readers interested in Scottish aviation heritage may find parallels in the industrial and operational history documented in our research volumes.
